amountTip

val amountTip: Long? = null

Indicates how much the user intends to tip in addition to the amount by at confirmation time.

This is only non-null in the PaymentIntent instance returned during collect when using updatePaymentIntent set to true in the CollectConfiguration. After confirmPaymentIntent the amount will have this tip amount added to it and the amountDetails will contain the breakdown of how much of the amount was a tip.
